data.name: Ryclaw: Save Yourself
data.detailed_description:
Save Yourself is a short visual novel about escaping a space station before it explodes.

When embittered scientist, Keller, hijacks the research station and sets the reactor to explode it becomes a race against time to escape. Find your colleagues, avoid lethal traps and overcome impossible odds to reach safety. Can you save your friends? Can you even save yourself?

* Match wits with Keller, a woman determined to end your life... even at the cost of her own.

* Safety in numbers - Find your colleagues and use their unique skills to overcome obstacles.

* Watch your step - Moving to a new area will cost you 30 seconds and with only 15 minutes to escape, you will need to chart your escape carefully or perish when the reactor explodes.

* Your life flashing before your eyes - With each fatal misstep new memories will unlock, containing glimpses into the characters' motivations and vital clues to aid your next escape attempt.

* Is the truth worth your life? - Two different endings: one leading to sweet freedom and the other to the terrible truth.

Save Yourself has a default window resolution of 960 X 640, but can be resized to suit your needs.

data.short_description: When embittered scientist, Keller, hijacks the research station and sets the reactor to explode it becomes a race against time to escape. Find your colleagues, avoid lethal traps and overcome impossible odds to reach safety. Can you save your friends? Can you even save yourself?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip

content_descriptors.notes: Contains short text descriptions of death and injury, a few visuals of dead bodies and mentions of an off-screen genocide.
